meaningMnemonic: A psychic <radical>leader</radical> can pick a <radical>thread</radical> up off the <radical>ground</radical> and make a <kanji>connection</kanji> with the person that it came from. This leader is very powerful, so even a thread is enough for them to make a psychic connection with the person who was wearing the thread.
readingMnemonic: As you develop this psychic <kanji>connection</kanji> with the owner of the thread, you can tell that he is currently eating a <reading>ca</reading>ke (けい).
